patthana15.89:1.1: Saraṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.89:2.1: Saraṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
